actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an Investment Tax Credit for property used in centralized livestock operations, and to establish the amount of such credit.

summary.text: Allows an investment tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code of 15 percent of the qualified investment for property used in centralized livestock operations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an Investment Tax Credit for property used in centralized livestock operations, and to establish the amount of such credit.
